neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Biometrics standards tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]ANTemplateType*FromNImage[/b] - demonstrates creation of ANTemplate records 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17 from image.[br] [b]ANTemplate/FCRecord/FIRecord/FMRecord to NTemplate[/b] - demonstrates ANTemplate/FCRecord/FIRecord/FMRecord convertion to NTemplate.[br] [b]ANTemplate to NImage[/b] - demonstrates how to save images stored in ANTemplate.[br] [b]NTemplate from ANTemplate/FMRecord[/b] - demonstrates creation of FMRecord/ANTemplate from NTemplate.[br] [b]FCRecord/FIRecord/IIRecord from image[/b] - demonstrates creation of FCRecord/FIRecord/IIRecord from image.[br]
